company_profile.name: Cansel
company_profile.mission: Cansel helps organizations in the engineering, surveying, construction, mining, architecture, manufacturing, printing, utilities, forestry, and government sectors measure, analyze, design, and build more efficiently and profitably. We have been providing tailored solutions to our clients for over 50 years.

business_model.primary_offering: Distributor of land-based positioning systems in Canada
business_model.value_proposition: Through the consolidated strength of our businesses, Cansel is able to provide your individual project needs and address a much larger solution for your entire organization. Choose a solution-based package to maximize your investment in technology and simplify project delivery no matter what industry you're in.

product_lines.name: Geospatial High Accuracy Field Instruments and Product

desired_employee_qualities: Ability to learn and understand new technologies quickly

communication_style.tone: Formal but straight to the point
communication_style.jargon_usage: Moderate industry terms appropriate to role
